remarks: Any value of the partial isomorphism A is a set of translations i.e. a set of vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
diaelrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diaelrn.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaelrn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaelrnN $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. ran I ) -> S C_ T ) $.
